titles.title: Through Your sacrifice O Lord I've been redeemed

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Through Your sacrifice O Lord I've been redeemed
By Your blood I've been cleansed
I've been brought near to You
And freely I've received
Now freely I will show my love for You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Take this world for I have Jesus
You alone are the treasure that I seek
When the lights are shining brightly
And I'm blinded deep within
Lord help me see the wonder of Your cross at work in me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The kingdoms of this world will soon become
The kingdoms of our Lord and of His Christ (x2)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And You will reign forever (x3)
And we will reign with You
